overview: It's a feel good movie with a sort of novelty and variety. Steamy stormy romantic flick, just as described! It has a unique storyline and high class cinematography and melodious music. The chemistry between the lead pair is laudable! They have shown matured performances. The story revolves around the ant in the college back drop. It's an intense love journey of two youngsters. Editing is crisp with no lags.
title: The Ant - The Love and The Girl in Between
